data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Č, Ř Á (2007): Chewing lice (Phthiraptera) from buntings, cardinals and tanagers (Passeriformes: Emberizidae, Cardinalidae, Thraupidae) from Costa Rica, with descriptions of two new species of the genus Myrsidea (Phthiraptera: Menoponidae). Zootaxa 1631: 57-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.179415
